verses.verse: "My spirit <WH7307> is broken, <WH2254> my days <WH3117> are extinguished, <WH2193> The grave <WH6913> is [ready] for me.
"Surely <WH518> <WH3808> mockers <WH2049> are with me, And my eye <WH5869> gazes <WH3885> on their provocation. <WH4784>
"Lay <WH7760> down, <WH7760> now, <WH4994> a pledge <WH6162> for me with Thyself; Who <WH4310> is there that will be my guarantor <WH8628> <WH3027>?
"For Thou hast kept <WH6845> their heart <WH3820> from understanding; <WH7922> Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> Thou wilt not exalt <WH7311> [them.]
"He who informs <WH5046> against friends <WH7453> for a share <WH2506> [of the spoil,] The eyes <WH5869> of his children <WH1121> also shall languish. <WH3615>
"But He has made <WH3322> me a byword <WH4914> of the people, <WH5971> And I am <WH1961> one at whom men spit. <WH8611>
"My eye <WH5869> has also grown <WH3543> dim <WH3543> because <WH4480> of grief, <WH9213> And all <WH3605> my members <WH3338> are as a shadow. <WH6738>
"The upright <WH3477> shall be appalled <WH8074> at this, <WH384> And the innocent <WH9345> shall stir <WH5782> up himself against <WH5921> the godless. <WH2611>
"Nevertheless the righteous <WH6662> shall hold <WH270> to his way, <WH1870> And he who has clean <WH2889> hands <WH3027> shall grow <WH3254> stronger <WH555> and stronger.
"But come <WH935> again <WH7725> all <WH3605> of you now, <WH4994> For I do not find <WH4672> a wise <WH2450> man <WH2450> among you.
"My days <WH3117> are past, <WH5674> my plans <WH2154> are torn <WH5423> apart, <WH5423> [Even] the wishes <WH4180> of my heart. <WH3824>
"They make <WH7760> night <WH3915> into day, <WH3117> [saying,] 'The light <WH216> is near, <WH7138>' in the presence <WH6440> of darkness. <WH2822>
"If <WH518> I look <WH6960> for Sheol <WH7585> as my home, <WH1004> I make <WH7502> my bed <WH3326> in the darkness; <WH2822>
If I call <WH7121> to the pit, <WH7845> 'You are my father'; To the worm, <WH1> 'my mother <WH7415> and my sister <WH517>';
Where <WH346> now <WH645> is my hope <WH8615>? And who <WH4310> regards <WH7789> my hope <WH8615>?
"Will it go <WH3381> down <WH3381> with me to Sheol <WH7585>? Shall we together <WH3162> go <WH5183> down <WH5183> into the dust <WH6083>?"
